mapper.sql: id, nick_name as nickName, sex, open_id as openId, phone, user_name as userName, pass_word as passWord, headimgurl, rank, type, country, province, city, attenation, un_attenation as unAttenation, last_login_ip_address as lastLoginIpAddress
mapper.insert: insert t_user ( id, nick_name, sex, open_id, phone, user_name, pass_word, headimgurl, country, province, city, attenation, un_attenation, last_login_ip_address ) value ( #{id}, #{nickName}, #{sex}, #{openId}, #{phone}, #{userName}, #{passWord}, #{headimgurl}, #{country}, #{province}, #{city}, #{attenation}, #{unAttenation}, #{lastLoginIpAddress} )
mapper.select: SELECT t.nick_name as nickName, t.headimgurl, t.sex FROM t_user t WHERE t.open_id = #{openId}
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_user t
t.`attenation` = #{attenation},
t.`un_attenation` = #{unAttenation},
t.headimgurl = #{headimgurl},
t.sex = #{sex},
t.nick_name = #{nickName},
t.update_time = now()
WHERE t.`open_id` = #{openId}
mapper.select:
SELECT t.`nick_name` as "nickName", t.`open_id` as "openId", t.`sex`, t.`headimgurl`, t2.`file_new_names` as "fileNewNames", t2.`file_suffic` as "fileSuffic", t2.`file_path` as "filePath", t2.title FROM t_user t LEFT JOIN t_user_files t2 ON t.open_id = t2.open_id
t2.`del_flag` =1 AND t.`del_flag` = 1
AND t2.open_id = #{openId}
ORDER BY t2.`update_time` DESC
